column2: [FromFrom.GetFullName] is finally in my domain, and as a descendent of [line_of_descent.GetTitledFirstName] [line_of_descent.GetOnlyDynastyName] my claim is true. If I were to adopt the arms and words of House [line_of_descent.GetOnlyDynastyName] as my own this claim would be solidified, and would surely please my vassals.
column3: [FromFrom.GetFullName] est enfin dans mon domaine, et en tant que descendant de [line_of_descent.GetTitledFirstName] [line_of_descent.GetOnlyDynastyName] ma revendication est valide. Si je devais adopter les armoiries et la devise de la Maison [line_of_descent.GetOnlyDynastyName], cette revendication serait solidifiée, et devrait sûrement contenter mes vassaux.

column2: Yes, it is the wisest course
column3: Oui, c'est la voie la plus sage

column2: No, I shall always be a [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
column3: Non, pour toujours, je serai un [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] !

column2:
[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], to assuage any doubt as to my rightful claim to [FromFromFrom.GetFullName], I will hereby adopt the arms and words of my ancestor [line_of_descent.GetTitledFirstName] [line_of_descent.GetOnlyDynastyName].

Signed
[From.GetTitledFirstName] of the House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]
column3:
[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], pour apaiser tout doute quant à mon droit légitime à [FromFromFrom.GetFullName], je vais adopter les armoiries et la devise de mon ancêtre [line_of_descent.GetTitledFirstName] [line_of_descent.GetOnlyDynastyName].

Signé
[From.GetTitledFirstName] de la Maison [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]
